02048301-303c-47b3-9396-77cae29e6dd3.description: This badge is to confirm that not only has the holder finished the Skills City Data Analytics bootcamp but has excelled on the course. This course includes the studying the CompTIA Data+ syllabus and focuses on a low code no code platform agnostic curriculum as well as personal development sessions, industry talks and a client facing project which are all completed over the course of a 16-week period with an expectation of a minimum of 25hrs of work per week.
02048301-303c-47b3-9396-77cae29e6dd3.name: Skills City Data Analytics Gold

badge_template_activities.title: 16-week intensive platform agnostic Data Analytics bootcamp completed including personal development sessions

1 client facing project completed as part of a team and with an industry related task. This included completion of project planning, client communications, report writing, presentations, teamwork and team meetings.
Multiple industry talks from employers and individuals within multiple industries with a tech related link. As well as completion of the client facing project.

d374b91a-38ec-4e3c-8a36-9b4b411a5cc7.description: This badge is to confirm that not only has the holder finished the Skills City AWS re/Start bootcamp but has excelled on the course. This course includes the AWS re/Start curriculum as well as personal development sessions, industry talks and a client facing project which are all completed over the course of a 12 week period with an expectation of a minimum of 40hrs of work per week.
d374b91a-38ec-4e3c-8a36-9b4b411a5cc7.name: Skills City AWS re/Start Gold

7d94c259-e125-49d1-b666-95c57f8761d3.description: This badge is to confirm that not only has the holder finished the Skills City Software Engineering bootcamp but has excelled on the course.
